Sentencas: Integrated gasification fuel cell technology is a promising option for processing solid fuels, which would enable high efficiencies to be reached in small-scale power generation.
Titulo: Towards integrated gasification and fuel cell operation with carbon capture: Impact of fuel gas on anode materials

Sentencas: Among the different fuel cell types, solid oxide fuel cells present a good temperature match with fluidised bed gasification as well as greater versatility in terms of the fuel gas composition they can handle.
Titulo: Towards integrated gasification and fuel cell operation with carbon capture: Impact of fuel gas on anode materials

Sentencas: However, their resistance to impurities in the gas needs to be addressed.
Titulo: Towards integrated gasification and fuel cell operation with carbon capture: Impact of fuel gas on anode materials

Sentencas: The main objective of this work is to assess the impact on typical materials used in fuel cell anodes of the gases produced from a gasifier operating with a N-2-free gasification agent, which would make the system carbon-capture ready.
Titulo: Towards integrated gasification and fuel cell operation with carbon capture: Impact of fuel gas on anode materials

Sentencas: A laboratory scale continuous pressurised fluidised bed reactor has been modified to study CO2 and steam (concentration up to 40 mol%.)
Titulo: Towards integrated gasification and fuel cell operation with carbon capture: Impact of fuel gas on anode materials

Sentencas: gasification of lignite at 850 degrees C. A second stage fixed bed reactor has been specially designed and constructed to study degradation of two SOFC anode materials (nickel/yttrium-stabilised zirconium oxide (Ni/YSZ) and nickel/gadolinium-doped ceria (Ni/CGO)) after exposure to real fuel gas at 765 degrees C.
Titulo: Towards integrated gasification and fuel cell operation with carbon capture: Impact of fuel gas on anode materials

Sentencas: Under these conditions, which did not involve any gas cleaning/conditioning between stages, carbon deposition on the surface of anode materials was much smaller than in previous studies that used model tar compounds as feeds.
Titulo: Towards integrated gasification and fuel cell operation with carbon capture: Impact of fuel gas on anode materials

Sentencas: Fuel gas from CO2/H2O gasification tended to deposit less carbon and sulphur on tested anode materials, particularly on Ni/CGO, than that from CO2 gasification.
Titulo: Towards integrated gasification and fuel cell operation with carbon capture: Impact of fuel gas on anode materials

Sentencas: The anode materials converted a significant fraction of the fed tar to gas.
Titulo: Towards integrated gasification and fuel cell operation with carbon capture: Impact of fuel gas on anode materials
